ComicInfo.Series: Tarot: Witch of the Black Rose
ComicInfo.Summary:
A HALLOWEEN CROSSOVER! SUPER HEROES MEET THE SUPERNATURAL! Tarot Witch of the Black Rose #28 "Witches-n-Kittens" Part 1 of 2 Story and Art By Jim Balent Tarot meets the 3 Kittens as they return from Iraq, transporting a secret cargo, Saddam Hussein, thought the streets of Salem. When Saddam escapes, thanks to the interference of Latex Red, Magickal Mayhem and costumed chaos ensues! This 3K/Tarot crossover, teams up the supernatural with Super heroes!
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-02-15 22:25:46. [CVDB121782]
